sentence.Network_en: The fabric is good at handle, elasticity and pendency.

sentence.Network_en: Appearance performances include drape pendency, stiffness and crease recovering, etc.

sentence.Network_en: The drape pendency of clothing is shape character that demonstrated in case of natural pendency.
sentence.Network_cn: 服装的悬垂性是指服装在自然悬垂的情况下所表现出的形状特征,诸如广义的服装服用舒适,视觉美观,是服装外观风格中的主要内容,也是部分服用性能在外观上的集中体现.
